header.title: Anti-Counterfeit Verification
header.description: Verify the authenticity of your NovaTech product using the manufacturing and authentication details printed on your carton.

result.success: ‚úÖ This product appears to be genuine and verified.
result.error: ‚ö†Ô∏è Invalid or incomplete data. Please check your inputs.

note.title: Note:
note.text: Each product can only be authenticated once. All fields are case sensitive. Please enter the exact serial number and authentication code printed on your pack.

warning.title: Warning:
warning.text: We strongly discourage purchasing loose ampoules, trays, or blisters without cartons. Genuine NovaTech products are always supplied in tamper-proof cartons with intact silver scratch fields, except Oral Strips which do not include authentication features.

hero.title: About NovaTech Sciences
hero.description: NovaTech Sciences is a forward-thinking pharmaceutical and nutraceutical organization committed to innovation, purity, and progress in healthcare. Our mission is to deliver world-class quality medicines and wellness products that enhance lives across the globe. With a presence in multiple therapeutic segments and strong international partnerships, we are driven by a deep commitment to science, safety, and sustainability.

who.title: Who We Are
who.p1: Founded with a vision to redefine pharmaceutical standards, NovaTech Sciences specializes in developing, manufacturing, and exporting high-quality formulations that meet stringent international compliance benchmarks. Our facilities operate under WHO-GMP and ISO standards, ensuring consistency and precision in every batch.

p2.middle: , NovaTech Sciences serves a broad spectrum of healthcare needs including general therapeutics, hormonal preparations, nutraceuticals, and wellness solutions. Our team of professionals ensures that every product reflects our core values ‚Äî

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To advance global health through innovative pharmaceutical and nutraceutical products that deliver proven efficacy, safety, and affordability.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be recognized as a global healthcare partner of choice ‚Äî combining research, innovation, and sustainable practices to serve humanity.

global.title: Global Reach and Future Expansion
global.text: With a rapidly expanding presence in Asia, Europe, and the Middle East, NovaTech Sciences is building a strong foundation of trust and excellence. Our focus on strategic partnerships, advanced R&D, and sustainable manufacturing ensures we continue to meet the evolving demands of the global healthcare landscape.

home.heroSubtitle: NovaTech Sciences brings you trusted medicines, diagnostics, and health solutions to help you live healthier and stronger every day.

whyChoose.title: ‚úî WHO-GMP Certified
whyChoose.text: Our manufacturing facilities follow WHO-GMP, ISO, and stringent quality standards.

whyChoose.title: üåç Global Reach
whyChoose.text: Trusted by healthcare professionals across multiple countries with continuous expansion.

whyChoose.title: üî¨ Research-Driven
whyChoose.text: We focus on science, innovation, and clinical efficacy for every product we deliver.

home.divisionsDesc: NovaTech Sciences specializes in two core pharmaceutical divisions ‚Äî precision-formulated Tablets and Injectables, designed to meet the highest standards of global healthcare and manufacturing excellence.

tablets.desc: Advanced oral solid dosage forms featuring hormone therapies, anabolic compounds, and specialized therapeutic formulations. Each tablet is engineered with precision coating technology and bioavailability optimization for consistent therapeutic outcomes.

injectables.desc: Premium sterile injectable formulations including testosterone blends, anabolic esters, and specialized therapeutic solutions. Manufactured in ISO-certified sterile facilities ensuring maximum purity, safety, and precise dosage accuracy.

help.title: Need Help Choosing?
help.text: Consult with our pharmaceutical experts for personalized guidance.

about.title: About NovaTech
about.text: NovaTech Sciences is dedicated to providing innovative healthcare solutions and trusted medicines. Our mission is to improve the quality of life with advanced, affordable, and reliable healthcare products.
